Translations.Text: Eta ekati sura, eta amara nayila karechi ebam era bidhanake amara abasya palaniya karechi, ara ete amara nayila karechi suspasta ayatasamuha yate tomara upadesa grahana kara

Byabhicarini o byabhicari-- tadera pratyekake ekasata betraghata karabe [1], allah‌ra bidhana karyakarikarane tadera prati daya yena tomaderake prabhabanbita na kare [2], yadi tomara allah‌ ebam akheratera upara imanadara ha'o; ara muminadera ekati dala yena tadera sasti pratyaksa kare

Byabhicari purusa-byabhicarinike athaba musarika narike chara biye kare na ebam byabhicarini nari, take byabhicari athaba musarika chara ke'u biye kare na [1], ara muminadera jan'ya eta harama kara hayeche

Ara yara saccaritra narira [1] prati apabada aropa kare, tarapara tara carajana saksi niye na ase, taderake tomara asiti betraghata kara ebam tomara kakhano tadera saksya grahana karabe na; era'i to phaseka
Tabe yara erapara ta'oba kare o nijederake sansodhana kare, tahale allah‌ to atisaya ksamasila, parama dayalu

Ara yara nijedera strira prati apabada aropa kare athaca nijera chara tadera kono saksi ne'i, tadera pratyekera saksya e'i, se allah‌ra name carabara sapatha kare balabe ye, se niscaya satyabadidera antarbhukta
ebam pancamabare balabe ye, se mithyabadi hale tara upara neme asabe allah‌ra la‘nata
Ara stri lokatira sasti rahita habe yadi se carabara allah‌ra name sapatha kare saksya deya ye, niscaya tara sbami'i mithyabadi
ebam pancamabare balabe ye, tara sbami satyabadi hale tara nijera upara neme asabe allah‌ra gayaba
Tomadera prati allah‌ra anugraha o daya na thakale [1]; ebam allah‌ to ta'oba grahanakari o prajnamaya
